hrothgar.name: Hrothgar Rock
hrothgar.bio:
Hrothgar's attention to detail-oriented action plans has earned him many accolades among his peers. He approaches problems with a top-down waterfall management style and has a proven track record of delivering cost savings.
Hrothgar joined the academy in A.D. 3188 following graduation at Swansea Space School.

aelfred.name: Aelfred the Overt
aelfred.bio:
Aelfred has been the ship's jester since the first launch, stoically regaling the crew during battles both military and emotional. His unique ability to lift afflicted spirits by a judicial application of psilocybin and gratuitous physical contact is a key part of the ship's incredible victory record.
Aelfred was sadly killed during a routine maneuvre when he tripped entering the transporter and was ripped into two segments.
